name: The Enthralling Realms: An Alchemist's Tale
name_original: The Enthralling Realms: An Alchemist's Tale
description:
Challenging fantasy match-3 game! Ever since they were children, Coral and Iris have trained to become powerful alchemists. They both show great potential, and Coral’s potential is matched by great ambition. But ambition can be dangerous. When an experiment goes terribly wrong, Coral accidentally causes the death of Iris. Stricken with grief and expelled from the academy, Coral sets out on a journey to master her skills as an alchemist and find a way to save Iris.

But is it possible to revive the dead? And can Coral find these answers while selling potions and talismans to the people who need her help?

One thing is certain: she won’t give up without a fight.

- Exciting match-3 puzzles!
- A story of love, atonement, and hope as a young alchemist tries to undo a terrible mistake
- 20 alchemical potions and items to master
- 5 regions filled with special ingredients and new customers
- A variety of unique customers, both human and otherwise
